document_data.name: Mortik Swamp
document_data.mainbody: The '''Mortik Swamp''' (also spelled '''Mortick Swamp''') was the only swamp in the [[halfling]] realm of [[Luiren]].
document_data.Geography:
{{Climate/Shining South/Forest and marsh|the Mortik Swamp}}
The Mortik Swamp was located in southern Luiren, just to the southeast of [[Chethel]]. It lay along [[Luirenstrand]] in the [[Great Sea]]. A road skirted the swamp's land boundaries to connect Chethel to [[Krenadir]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The swamp was inhabited by monsters, namely [[Merrow (ogre)|merrow]] and [[scrag]]s, which often raided nearby lands.
document_data.History: In [[148 DR]], merrow from Mortik Swamp attacked the halfling settlement of Chethel, destroying half of the city. In [[1372 DR]], an ogre shaman known as the [[Bog King]] led the merrow and used the scrags for his own purposes.
